DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Restorative Materials Primary Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: Restorations place four primary molar teeth proximal caries , split mouth design . 100 patient include study . The teeth randomize four group accord restorative material . Group 1 : Adhesive agent+ Compomer ( Dyract AP , Dentsply DeTrey , Konstanz , Germany ) Group 2 : Primer + Resin modify glass ionomer ( Vitremer , 3M ESPE , U.S. ) Group 3 : Adhesive agent + Giomer ( Beautifil II , ( Shofu Dental , Tokyo , Japan ) Group 4 : Amalgam ( Permite amalgam , SDI Limited , Bayswater , Australia ) The restoration evaluate baseline , 3. , 6. , 12. month first year , every 6 month 5 year . The modified US Public Health Service criterion ( secondary caries , marginal integrity , marginal discoloration retention ) use clinical evaluation restoration . The data analyse statistically use Wilcoxon test , chi square test Kaplan-Meier survival method use estimate survival percentage .
